Key Match Events: Pakistan bowled New Zealand out for 90 runs
Mohammed Rizwan scored an unbeaten 45 off 34 balls to anchor the chase
Post-Match Reflections: Black Caps captain Michael Bracewell said the Rawalpindi pitch was not an easy one to handle
Bracewell said the players would need to learn quickly for the next game
Others: Pakistan has taken a 1-0 lead in the five match series
The series opener was abandoned due to rain
